title: Kayak
creator_credit: Bill Snider, Len Aitken and Pyramid Films
brief_description: A non-narrated view of the sport of kayaking. Slow-motion sequences with men and kayaks twisting through rolling rapids and gliding over placid lakes are intercut in this film to capture the excitement and beauty of the sport. The film is not designed to teach skills.
creator_credit_for_label: Bill Snider, Len Aitken and Pyramid Films
